commit.message:
re PR ipa/60965 (IPA: Devirtualization versus placement new)


	PR ipa/60965
	* ipa-devirt.c (get_class_context): Allow POD to change to non-POD.
	* g++.dg/ipa/devirt-32.C: New testcase.

From-SVN: r210086
